doc:
Debi Derryberry https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Debi_Derryberry 0 Debi Derryberry is an American voice actress who has provided voices for a number of animated television series, anime and video games. Her voice roles include the title character from Jimmy Neutron: Boy Genius and The Adventures of Jimmy Neutron: Boy Genius, Draculaura in all media forms of Monster High (Under the pseudonym Dee Dee Green), Wednesday in The Addams Family cartoon, Jackie in Bobby's World, Clay in many Playhouse Disney segments, and Weenie and Catrina in Oswald. In English language dubs of anime, Derryberry provided the voice of Ryo-Ohki in the Tenchi Muyo series. She received a Best Actress in a Comedy award at the American Anime Awards for her work as Zatch in Zatch Bell!. Debi_Derryberry is an_American_voice_actress who has_provided voices for a_number of animated_television_series_,_anime_and_video_games . Her_voice_roles include the_title_character from Jimmy_Neutron : Boy_Genius and The_Adventures of Jimmy_Neutron : Boy_Genius , Draculaura in all_media_forms of Monster_High_( Under the_pseudonym_Dee_Dee_Green_) , Wednesday in The_Addams_Family_cartoon , Jackie in Bobby 's_World , Clay in many_Playhouse_Disney_segments , and Weenie_and_Catrina in Oswald . In English_language dubs of anime , Derryberry provided the_voice of Ryo-Ohki in the_Tenchi_Muyo_series . She received a_Best_Actress in a_Comedy_award at the_American_Anime_Awards for her_work as Zatch in Zatch_Bell ! .
